Silent Street Team Makes A Sale
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: The Monster Rancher Street Team -Join Us!: Success Stories!: Silent Street Team Makes A Sale
By Kurasu Soratobu on Wednesday, October 6, 2004 - 05:35 am:

So, I've been not-around a lot, as you might notice. But I may be down, but I'm not out! I've got Monster Rancher 4 instated as one of the games that our local store rents out. And considering this is a place with only about 1000 people, that's a trick. Hopefully some country ripples will spread out from there.

How I did it? I handed the game to the kid of the owner and we discussed it, since he has similar taste to me. Next time I came through, guess what was in the rental areas?

Just goes to show how easy it can be to spread the word.
